TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DiscreteInt16KeyFrame extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16KeyFrame

summary.span: 使用離散插補，從上一個主要畫面格的 值繪製到其自有的 。

span.span: Animates from the value of the previous key frame to its own using discrete interpolation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別用做為一部分配合來以動畫顯示沿著一組主要畫面格的屬性值。This class is used as part of a in conjunction with a to animate a property value along a set of key frames. 主要畫面格定義一段所屬。A key frame defines a segment of the to which it belongs. 每個主要畫面格有 target和。Each key frame has a target and a . 指定的時間主要畫面格的應該達到。The specifies the time at which the key frame's should be reached. 主要畫面格以動畫顯示先前的主要畫面格的目標值至它自己的目標值。A key frame animates from the target value of the previous key frame to its own target value. 它先前的主要畫面格結束，並結束其自己的關鍵時間到達時啟動。It starts when the previous key frame ends and ends when its own key time is reached. 特定主要畫面格喜歡突然 」 之間建立跳躍點 」 （未插補） 的值。Discrete key frames like create sudden "jumps" between values (no interpolation). 換句話說，動畫的屬性不會變更達到主要畫面格的關鍵時間為止，屆時動畫的屬性會突然跳到目標值。In other words, the animated property does not change until the key frame's key time is reached, at which point the animated property goes suddenly to the target value. ## Examples 動畫的插補描述了動畫如何在其持續期間內進行值之間的轉換。An animation's interpolation describes how an animation transitions between values over its duration. 選取動畫所要使用的主要畫面格型別，即可定義該主要畫面格區段的插補方法。By selecting which key frame type you use with your animation, you can define the interpolation method for that key frame segment. 插補方法有三種不同類型：線性、離散和曲線。There are three different types of interpolation methods: linear, discrete, and splined. 這個範例會使用來示範這些插補類型。This example uses a to demonstrate these interpolation types. 下列範例會使用每個可用的不同的插補方法類別以動畫顯示的位置。The following example uses each of the different interpolation methods available to the class to animate the position of a . 1. 在前三秒內，會使用的執行個體類別將矩形沿著路徑以穩定速率的資料從其起始位置移動到 500 位置。During the first three seconds, uses an instance of the class to move the rectangle along a path at a steady rate from its starting position to the 500 position. 線性主要畫面格喜歡建立平滑的線性轉換值之間。Linear key frames like create a smooth linear transition between values. 2. 在第四秒結束時，使用的執行個體突然將矩形移動到下一個位置的類別。At the end of the fourth second, uses an instance of the class to suddenly move the rectangle to the next position. 特定主要畫面格喜歡建立突然跳躍點之間的值。Discrete key frames like create sudden jumps between values. 在此範例中，矩形位在起始位置，接著會突然出現在 500 位置。In this example, the rectangle is at the starting position and then suddenly appears at the 500 position. 3. 在最後兩秒，使用的執行個體類別來將矩形移回起始位置。In the final two seconds, uses an instance of the class to move the rectangle back to its starting position. 曲線主要畫面格喜歡變數之間建立轉換的值根據屬性。Spline key frames like create a variable transition between values according to the value of the property. 在此範例中，矩形一開始會緩慢移動，然後以指數方式加速接近時間區段結尾In this example, the rectangle begins by moving slowly and then speeds up exponentially toward the end of the time segment [!code-csharp[keyframes_snip#AltDoubleAnimationUsingKeyFramesWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/keyframes_snip/CSharp/AltDoubleAnimationUsingKeyFramesExample.cs#altdoubleanimationusingkeyframeswholepage)] [!code-vb[keyframes_snip#AltDoubleAnimationUsingKeyFramesWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/keyframes_snip/visualbasic/altdoubleanimationusingkeyframesexample.vb#altdoubleanimationusingkeyframeswholepage)] [!code-xaml[keyframes_snip#AltDoubleAnimationUsingKeyFramesWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/keyframes_snip/XAML/AltDoubleAnimationUsingKeyFramesExample.xaml#altdoubleanimationusingkeyframeswholepage)] 並非每個\<類型 > AnimationUsingKeyFrames 類別支援所有的插補方法。Not every \AnimationUsingKeyFrames class supports all interpolation methods. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 主要畫面格動畫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md)。For more information, see the [Key-Frame Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md).

param.span: 主要畫面格的 Key Time。

span.span: The key time for the key frame.

param.span: Key Time 決定何時到達目標值，這也是主要畫面格的結束時間。

span.span: The key time determines when the target value is reached, which is also when the key frame ends.

summary.span: 使用指定結束值和 Key Time，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified ending value and key time.

summary.span: 建立 的新執行個體。

MemberSignature.Value: protected override short InterpolateValueCore (short baseValue, double keyFrameProgress);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance int16 InterpolateValueCore(int16 baseValue, float64 keyFrameProgress) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function InterpolateValueCore (baseValue As Short, keyFrameProgress As Double) As Short
protected: override short InterpolateValueCore(short baseValue, double keyFrameProgress);

param.name: keyFrameProgress
param.span: 從 0.0 到 1.0 的值，會指定這個主要畫面格經過的時間百分比。

span.span: A value from 0.0 through 1.0 that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.

summary.span: 使用離散插補在先前的主要畫面格值與目前的主要畫面格值之間進行轉換。

span.span: Uses discrete interpolation to transition between the previous key frame value and the value of the current key frame.

returns.span: 在指定基底值和漸次累加時，這個主要畫面格的輸出值。

span.span: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
